title: Requires the commissioner to establish standards for inspection and certification of green roofs and provides for a green roof installation credit
summary: Requires the commissioner to establish standards for and a program of inspection and certification of green roofs prior to and after installation, including standards for environmentally acceptable chemical fertilizers and the testing of runoff water for evidence of such fertilizers; further establishes a green roof installation credit in the amount of fifty-five percent of qualified expenditures with a credit maximum of five thousand dollars.

   15  COMMERCIAL INSTALLERS AND THE PUBLIC OF ANY PROHIBITIONS AND RECOMMENDA-

   22  THE PURCHASE, CONSTRUCTION AND INSTALLATION OF A  GREEN  ROOF  WHICH  IS

   25  CIPAL RESIDENCE AT THE TIME THE GREEN ROOF IS PLACED IN SERVICE.
   26    (B) SUCH QUALIFIED EXPENDITURES SHALL INCLUDE EXPENDITURES FOR MATERI-
   27  ALS, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO,  IRRIGATION  SYSTEMS,  PRODUCTION  OF

   30  NEERING  SERVICES,  PRE-INSTALLATION  CRITERIA  FOR   INSTALLATION   AND
   31  DESIGNS  AND  PLANS DIRECTLY RELATED TO THE CONSTRUCTION OR INSTALLATION
   32  OF THE GREEN ROOF.
   33    (C) SUCH QUALIFIED EXPENDITURES SHALL NOT INCLUDE  INTEREST  OR  OTHER
   34  FINANCE CHARGES.
   35    (3)  GREEN  ROOF  PRE-INSTALLATION  CRITERIA.  THE  TERM  "GREEN  ROOF
   36  PRE-INSTALLATION CRITERIA" SHALL INCLUDE, BUT NOT BE LIMITED TO, HEIGHT,
   37  GROWTH RATE, DROUGHT TOLERANCE, IRRIGATION OR NUTRITIONAL  REQUIREMENTS,
   38  GENERATION  OF  ALLERGENS  AND  REMEDIAL  AIR  FILTRATION AND TESTING OF
   39  RUNOFF WATER FOR ENVIRONMENTALLY UNACCEPTABLE CHEMICAL FERTILIZERS.

   41  BY  A CONDOMINIUM MANAGEMENT ASSOCIATION OR A COOPERATIVE HOUSING CORPO-
   42  RATION, A TAXPAYER WHO IS A MEMBER OF THE CONDOMINIUM MANAGEMENT ASSOCI-
   43  ATION OR WHO IS A TENANT-STOCKHOLDER IN THE COOPERATIVE  HOUSING  CORPO-
   44  RATION  MAY  FOR  THE  PURPOSE  OF THIS SUBSECTION CLAIM A PROPORTIONATE
   45  SHARE OF THE TOTAL EXPENSES AS EXPENDITURE FOR THE PURPOSES OF THE CRED-
   46  IT ATTRIBUTABLE TO HIS OR HER PRINCIPAL RESIDENCE.
   47    (5) MULTIPLE TAXPAYERS. WHERE A GREEN ROOF IS PURCHASED AND  INSTALLED
   48  IN  A PRINCIPAL RESIDENCE SHARED BY TWO OR MORE TAXPAYERS, THE AMOUNT OF
   49  THE CREDIT ALLOWABLE UNDER THIS SUBSECTION FOR EACH SUCH TAXPAYER  SHALL
   50  BE  PRORATED  ACCORDING  TO  THE PERCENTAGE OF THE TOTAL EXPENDITURE FOR
   51  SUCH ROOF CONTRIBUTED BY EACH TAXPAYER.
   52    (6) GRANTS. FOR PURPOSES OF DETERMINING THE AMOUNT OF THE  EXPENDITURE
   53  INCURRED  IN PURCHASING AND INSTALLING THE GREEN ROOF, THE AMOUNT OF ANY
   54  FEDERAL, STATE OR LOCAL GRANT RECEIVED BY THE TAXPAYER, WHICH  WAS  USED
   55  FOR  THE  PURCHASE  AND/OR  INSTALLATION  OF SUCH ROOF AND WHICH WAS NOT
